closedInvariants.rule: Password must be at least 8 characters.
Workspace members are the only actors allowed to read/create tasks in that workspace.
Invitations can be accepted only when status is pending, not expired, and email matches authenticated principal.
Invitation list visibility is scoped to invitations whose email matches the authenticated principal.
Domain mutations are accepted only via API/application services; direct UI-to-DB writes are forbidden.
